name: Scrambled (Free Range Humans)
description:
Scrambled is a game created for the Ukie #raisethegamejam, made in roughly 32 hours.

Short obstacle course cooperative race game where 2 to 4 players work together to bring an egg to the end of the course!

Must be played with gamepads, should support any and all gamepads that have a standardized layout (Playstation, Xbox or derivative controllers)

Controls have been simplified with accessibility in mind

To play, simply unzip the zip file and start the Scrambled.exe file!

WARNING: Includes an overabundance of chicken and egg related puns.
